import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useUser } from '../UserContext'; const Navbar = () => { const { user } = useUser(); const [navOpen, setOpen] = useState(false) return (

ESHOP

{ user ? (

{user.name}

Log Out
):(
Login
) } Home Shop
setOpen(!navOpen)}> {navOpen && (
setOpen(!navOpen)}>Login
setOpen(!navOpen)}>Home setOpen(!navOpen)}>Shop
)}
) } export default Navbar
